title: Wrote The Book, Made, The Movie, Raised The Kids, Now The Blogâ€¦: 21st Century Musings from an Exhausted Renaissance Woman
description: Modern women really can have it all - work, family, friends and fans - but having a sense of humour helps! By popular demand, Shamim Sarif's collected blogs from 2009 are all here, together with full colour photos and captions."Hilarious and insightful, the blogs follow Shamim's work as a writer, director, mother and wife - the 21st Century musings of an exhausted Renaissance woman.
author: Shamim Sarif
